text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Apprentice natural gas fitter" means, unless the context requires otherwise, an individual who is licensed by the Board to assist a master natural gas fitter in providing natural gas services while:
under the direction and control of the master natural gas fitter; and
in training to become a journeyman natural gas fitter.

"Apprentice plumber" means, unless the context requires otherwise, an individual who is licensed by the Board to assist a master plumber or a holder of a limited master plumber license in providing plumbing services while:
under the direction and control of the master plumber or holder of the limited master plumber license; and
in training to become a journey plumber.
"Board" means the State Board of Plumbing.
"Certified propane gas fitter" means an individual who has been certified by the Board to provide propane gas services.
"Gas" means natural gas, propane gas, or any other gas used for any purpose, including residential, medical, commercial, or industrial purposes.

"Journey plumber" means, unless the context requires otherwise, an individual who is licensed by the Board to provide plumbing services while under the direction and control of a master plumber or holder of a limited master plumber license.

"Journeyman natural gas fitter" means, unless the context requires otherwise, an individual who is licensed by the Board to provide natural gas services while under the direction and control of a master natural gas fitters license.

section.section:
"Limited license" means a license issued by the Board as limited by § 12-310 of this title to:
provide plumbing services as a master plumber; or
provide plumbing services as a journey plumber.

"Limited license" includes:
a limited master plumber license; and
a limited journey plumber license.

text.section: "Master natural gas fitter" means, unless the context requires otherwise, an individual who is licensed by the Board to provide natural gas services.

section.section: "Master plumber" means, unless the context requires otherwise, an individual who is licensed by the Board to provide plumbing services and natural gas services.
"Master plumber" includes a master plumber gas fitter.

"Provide natural gas services" means the installation, maintenance, extension, alteration, and removal of piping, gas-fired equipment, appliances, or appurtenances in connection with a natural gas supply system downstream of the gas utility point of delivery.

"Provide natural gas services" does not include the installation, maintenance, extension, alteration, or removal of any of the following with respect to the plumbing water supply and drainage system:
fixtures that require additional energy sources, including clothes washers, dishwashers, food grinders, humidifiers, ice pumps, sterilizers, water coolers, and water heaters; and
operational devices, including aerators, backflow preventers, expansion tanks, filters, flow controls, heat exchangers, interceptors, meters, separators, and relief valves.

"Provide plumbing services" means to install, maintain, extend, alter, or remove piping, a plumbing fixture, a plumbing appliance, a plumbing appurtenance, or other plumbing apparatus:
within or adjacent to a building, structure, or property; and
in connection with:
"Provide plumbing services" includes installing, repairing, servicing, and replacing gas piping, gas utilization equipment, and associated accessories.

text.section: "Provide propane gas services" means to install, repair, service, and replace propane gas piping, propane gas utilization equipment, and associated accessories.

"State Plumbing Code" means the regulations adopted by the Secretary, as amended by the Board, to provide standards that:
are based on principles of environmental sanitation and safety; and
provide for properly designed, acceptably installed, and adequately maintained plumbing systems.
